## Lab purpose

We use genetic- and genomic-based research approaches to study a variety of complex diseases, with a specific focus on health promotion and development in pregnancy and early childhood. Some examples include:

-   [The Foafoaga o le Ola Study](./foafoaga.qmd): A mom-baby study in Samoa
-   [The HOPE Study](./hope.qmd): A mom-baby study in American Samoa
-   [The GROW Study](./grow.qmd): A pregnancy study in American Samoa
-   [The EETR Study](./eetr.qmd): A study of traumatic brain injury (TBI) outcomes in children

Additional populations of interest include adults with aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage, TBI, obesity and other cardiovascular disease risk factors, gestational diabetes, and preeclampsia.
